name: Miltank
author: Mina Nakai
flavor_text: Its milk is high in calories and packed with nutrients. Therefore, if you drink too much of it, you may wind up with a body like Miltank’s.

abilities.name: Moomoo Malt
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon, whenever you attach an Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Pokémon, heal 90 damage from that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sitdown Splash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.
